extendedInfo.description: Do WELLâ  from Capital BlueCrossPracticing healthy habits and getting on the right track to good health can be tough. Thatâs why we introduced Do WELL, the app that helps make wellness more doable.With Do WELL, you're in control. You set the goals you want to achieve. You choose the habits to help accomplish your objectives. You track your progress and chart your course to wellness. You'll get reminders and badges along the way, and you can share habits with friends. Do WELL is a feature of the Capital BlueCross WELL Doneâ  value based benefits program, but this mobile app is free to everyone.FEATURES - Make good habits that support your goals- Access our library for tips and pointers- Create custom habits just for you- Define motivations to help keep you on track- Track your progress with periodic reminders- Share your success with friends and encourage them to improve their health- View Reports/Graphs- Stay inspired with motivational quotes- Pictures speak a 1,000 words, so add photos important to you- Export statistics to spreadsheets or databases

reviews.title: Just in time for the new year!
reviews.comment: This app is just the tool I didn\'t know I needed. It\'s easy to use and lets me track all of my wellness activities. The app includes a robust library of habits associated with Cap Blue\'s plan benefits, and I can create my own too (stretch twice a day, train for a 5K). I love being able to do all this from my phone!
reviews.author: Mary Jo Stojak
